reviews.review: Portal is truly a classic that still shines in nearly every way. It's gameplay is top-notch: conceptually simple and accessible without sacrificing more advanced applications. The atmosphere of Aperture Laboratories formed through masterful art direction and sound design is unforgettable, overshadowing the somewhat dated graphics almost immediately. While the game only takes an average of one or two hours, Portal also manages to construct a story that is both lighthearted and unsettling. But above all, Portal is just pure [i]fun[/i], and is an absolute must-play.
very big brain game i liked it the second part is good too
My very first game on steam and one of the very best I've ever played. I dont know what constitutes a perfect game, but this cant be far. Just Excellent

Meu deus! Por que eu nunca tinha jogado esse jogo antes?!? Que obra prima... me sinto at√© mal de ter pagado t√£o pouco em um jogo t√£o bom. Se voc√™ nunca jogou, esse √© obrigat√≥rio. Joguei pela primeira vez no momento dessa an√°lise (dez/2020) e o jogo continua maravilhoso.

A great physics based puzzle platformer. It has a nice sense of progression, and really the only FPS I can genuinely see myself playing. 

The story and atmosphere surrounding it are very good too. You genuinely feel alone yet always have that creeping feeling that something is up, and you learn more and more as you go through. Also despite this sense of foreboding, it finds a way to be funny.

My only gripes are that the game controls rely on the keyboard, so when I want to crouch, I have to press the control button when I'm using the gamepad. And I prefer playing with gamepad because I don't like playing Twister on the keyboard with my hands to play games. And then there the timing mechanics of the 18th chamber. They are admittedly rather frustrating.

But over all, great game.
A great puzzle game, even 13 years later. Of course, it's going to be shorter than most games you find today, but it's still a fun play, and at a very affordable price.

The last time I played the game, it was 2012 and I was so amazed because it was one of the first games I ever played, today I reinstalled it and it was still as fun and interesting, as all of those years ago.
